name: SMW 2+3: The Essence Star
overview: The Essence Star...it was sent to Mario's realm from the heavens above with one purpose: to benefit the world through the actions of kind people. However, if it falls into the hands of evil, the complete opposite will occur. What fate will result when the likes of Golden Yoshi and Kamek all want to get their hands on the sacred star? Find out all of this and more...in SMW2+3: The Essence Star.
